fields.title: Associated Press Poll: Women in the Military

dsDescription.dsDescriptionValue: This study focused on women in the military. Issues addressed include whether men and women should be trained separately, allegations of sexual misconduct, and hazing. Demographic data include sex, age, marital status, education, race, veteran status, income, employment status, past voting behavior, and household composition.

fields.notesText: Subject: Study Level Error Note, Notes: The survey used a modified probability sample of adults.; Subject: null  Type: ODUM:ACCESS.CATEGORY  Notes: II;
